document_data.name: Laralera Thundreth
document_data.mainbody: e ran a very permissive establishment, allowing her patrons to conduct nearly any manner of business while they drink and gamble. She even allowed them to indulge in barroom fights with one another, so long as she received compensation for any damages.
document_data.Abilities: She ran a very permissive establishment, allowing her patrons to conduct nearly any manner of business while they drink and gamble. She even allowed them to indulge in barroom fights with one another, so long as she received compensation for any damages.
document_data.Possessions: Within her cabin in the Low Lantern, Laraelra kept a trapped treasure chest that held some of her valuables, including her personal correspondence and [[spellbook]].
document_data.Relationships: Her [[familiar]] was a [[crab]] that enjoyed sitting atop her shoulder.
document_data.History: In the 1480s DR, Laraelra caught the attention of both [[Torlin Silvershield]] and [[Ulder Ravengard]]. Torlin sent his goons to investigate her potential activities with the Guild, whilst Ulder sent the Flaming Fist to turn her establishment upside down and seize her. She attempted to flee by lowering a [[rope ladder]] towards her escape dinghy. Laraelra planned on bargaining with her captors by offering them an expensive jeweled [[necklace]].
